desc: ToteAll eco-friendly totes are perfect for every occasion from travel to work to shopping to a night out on the town. A strong but foldable fabric allows you to take it everywhere. We search for cotton canvas in heavy weights to stand the test of time and our design is extra reinforced to hold it all.

layout.text: The perfect mix of style and utility. High-quality eco-friendly tote bags made from up-cycled cotton fabrics.
